purpose: The email announces the IEEE Annual Congress on Artificial Intelligence of Things (IEEE AIoT 2024), scheduled for July 24-26, 2024, in Melbourne, Australia. It provides important details regarding paper submissions, including deadlines for submission, notification of acceptance, and final manuscript submission. The conference aims to bring together various stakeholders in the fields of AI and IoT to discuss new ideas and establish collaborations. It highlights the integration of AI technologies into IoT systems and outlines specific areas of focus for the conference, such as AIoT architectures, applications, standards, and ethical concerns. Authors are invited to submit original papers on a range of topics related to AI and IoT.
